title: Stockberg
text: The Stockberg is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Appenzell%20Alps">Appenzell Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Nesslau">Nesslau</a> in the canton of <a href="Canton%20of%20St.%20Gallen">St. Gallen</a>. It lies on the range west of the <a href="S%C3%A4ntis">Säntis</a>.
